name: CSE314A
postCreateCommand: npm install @devcontainers/cli && curl -LO https://storage.googleapis.com/container-structure-test/latest/container-structure-test-linux-amd64 && chmod +x container-structure-test-linux-amd64 && sudo mv container-structure-test-linux-amd64 /usr/local/bin/container-structure-test && echo alias cst='container-structure-test' >>  /home/vscode/.bashrc && poetry install && pre-commit install
